meanings.sent1: The smell of the garbage was truly loathsome.
meanings.sent2: The slimy creature was so loathsome that I couldn't bear to look at it.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat found the loathsome food in the trash unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: The loathsome behavior of the bully made everyone avoid him like a contagious disease.
meanings.sent5: The loathsome sight of the decaying fruit made my stomach turn.

meanings.definition: Feeling intense dislike or disgust; abhorrent
meanings.sent1: She had a loathsome feeling towards the creepy crawlies.
meanings.sent2: The taste of the medicine was so loathsome that he couldn't swallow it.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating snails seemed loathsome to the picky eater.
meanings.sent4: The loathsome sound of nails on a chalkboard made her cringe.
meanings.sent5: The loathsome behavior of the rude customer left a bad impression on everyone.
